alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from The Hammocks to near Florida City. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Miami Beach, Homestead, Coral Gables, South Miami, Surfside, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, The Redland, Virginia Key, Kendall, Doral, Pinecrest, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, Florida City, Miami Shores, North Bay Village and West Miami. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
